112111.content: One afternoon you were walking down the road from school, you took the long way because you were trying to avoid running into an your ex girl friend that broke your heart, as you were walking along you pass a strange looking house it had plants in the front yard with a small pond with coy fish in it as you were straying at the house all of a sudden you see a bright flash and you are naked to the floor and pass out when you wake you realize everything looks bigger then you estimated that your only an inch tall you look around and you think that maybe who ever lives here might be able to help you with your problem so you walk up to the front door and slip into the large doggie door that’s there next you realize the people who live there are….
112111.title: make your way into her house....

1121111.content: When you enter the house you see a simple kitchen. Tile floor, nice lighting, fridge, a sink, a stove, and an enormous ninetales... You fall back from the surprise of seeing the large multi-tailed fox being so close to you without having made its presence known. You quickly stammer to your feet and then...
1121111.title: awake (only rossey is home)

122.content: What type of anthro are you?
122.title: An anthro

choices: You want to try something new
12212.content:
You can't believe it. Your mom and dad are not only going on vacation without you, but they are also making you stay with a stupid babysitter.

"But mom, I don't need a babysitter. I'm 13."

Your mother just laughs. "Yes you do son, last time we left you home alone, you called 911 on the mail man dropping off the mail."

You just cross your arms and grump. "I was 8 when that happened"

Your dad walks out of the house with his luggage. "Don't worry champ, it's only 4 or so weeks."

Your mom says to you. "Ok the babysitter should be here soon, I left the money for her on the counter, and a few list of such and contacts. Now don't do anything stupid in the time it takes for the babysitter to get here." She then leans down and kisses you on the cheek. "Bye son see you in a few weeks." She said hoping into the car with your father.

You see them drive away, and you head back inside.

"Atleast I get a little time to myself" you say sitting down on the couch.

About 10 minute pass as you watch tv, and you hear the door bell. You get up and head to the for to open it, and when you do you see big and beautifully nine tails standing there with two suit cases. Your caught off guard by her body, she's thic with a nice big but, and has big beautifully breasts. Your young teenage mind can barley function around her.

Eventually your baby sitter speaks up. "I know, it's kinda rare to see us nine tails around, anyways I'm Rachel, nice to meet you will, and don't worry, I'm a pretty experienced baby sitter, so I'm sure we'll have lots of fun." She says patting your head then walks inside.

You quickly follow behind her, and you can't help but stair at her ass. You shake you mind a bit and speak up. "Ya I guess I've never seen a nine tails around before." You say kinda quietly.

Rachel turns around and says. "So Will. What do you want to do?"
12212.title: Fox

122121.content:
"How about we get some food." you say handing Rachel a take out menu.

Rachel looks at the menu for a bit, then she says. "I do like Mexican food, but it gives me pretty bad gas." She says patting her belly. "Is it all right if I order Mexican for us?"

You think for a bit and decide.
122121.title: Get some food
